title: No Bad Deed
description: Eden is called back after the Carlotti heirs are taken into police custody, framed for a crime they didn't commit. It's up to her and Vinnie to get the situation under control...no matter what it takes.With the help of an unexpected ally, Eden and the guys may get their happily ever after yet. Or at least their version of it.No Bad Deed is the epic conclusion to the Bad Habits Duology and is intended for mature audiences.
author: Emma   Cole
